Package pbxuniverse

Class PBXTools

java.lang.Object
pbxuniverse.PBXTools
public class PBXTools extends Object
Static utility methods for working with LEDs, drawn from Pixelblaze, FASTLed and other places.

  • Method Details

    • mod

      public static float mod​(float a, float b)
      FFS -- Java has no mod operator? Why?? Are we not well into the Century of the Fruit Bat? Isn't forcing all bytes to be signed trouble enough for one language? What next?

      Returns:
      The floored remainder of the division a/b. The result will have the same sign as b.

    • sawtooth

      public static float sawtooth​(float time, float period)
      Returns the height of a sawtooth wave of specified period, at the specified time. Height range is 0.0 to 1.0.

      Roughly equivalent to Pixelblaze's time() function, but leaves the actual calculation of the current time to the user.

      Parameters:
      time - - current time, in any units, but usually in milliseconds
      period - - the period of the sawtooth wave. Should be given in the same units as the time parameter above.
      Returns:
      the value of the sawtooth function at the current time (0.0 to 1.0)

    • triangle

      public static float triangle​(float n)

      Parameters:
      n - - value between 0.0 and 1.0
      Returns:

      public static float wave​(float n)
      Converts a value between 0.0 and 1.0, representing a sawtooth waveform, to a position on a sine wave between 0.0 to 1.0.
      Parameters:
      n - - value between 0.0 and 1.0

    • square

      public static float square​(float n, float dutyCycle)
      Converts a value between 0.0 and 1.0, representing a sawtooth waveform, to a position on a square wave between 0.0 to 1.0, using the specified duty cycle.
      Parameters:
      n - value between 0.0 and 1.0
      dutyCycle - - percentage of time the wave is "on", range 0.0 to 1.0
      Returns:
